casebody.data:
IN RE: Todd W. SHORT 46P16-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 21, 2016 Todd Short, for Short, Todd W.

Steven Kropelnicki, Jr., Attorney at Law, Asheville.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of September 2016 by Petitioner for Extension of Time to File Petition for Writ of Certiorari to the Supreme Court of North Carolina:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 21st of October 2016."
